content:
Bunty and Bubly 
 Sorit Gupto 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Bunty loves to play with 
 
 buterflies. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 .and with birds. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She loves to play with 
 
 paper boats. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She also likes to make 
 
 sand castles. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When Bunty goes back 
 
 home, her mother asks her 
 
 to clean up. She refuses. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "I hate soap!" she screams. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One night, she has a 
 
 dream. The germs are al 
 
 around her castle, and are 
 
 atacking her. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Bunty is chased by the 
 
 germs. 
 
 
 
 She runs for her life and 
 
 screams, "Help.help!" 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sudenly, Soap King 
 
 Bubly apears. 
 
 
 
 "Bunty, don't be afraid," he 
 
 says. 
 
 
 
 "Go atack the germs!" the 
 
 Soap King orders his army 
 
 
 of bubles. 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The army of bubles 
 
 chases the germs away. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 These days, Bunty likes to 
 
 use soap, and she brushes 
 
 and scrubs herself clean. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1
